mapper.select: select * from post_comment where post_id=#{postId} order by 1
mapper.insert: insert into post_comment (comment_id, member_id, post_id, comment_content, write_date) values(#{commentId}, #{memberId}, #{postId}, #{commentContent}, sysDate)
mapper.update: update post_comment set comment_content = #{commentContent} where comment_id = #{commentId}
